classmethod updateCustomer(customer_id, products, user_id, custom={})¶

Update Customer

Create/Update multiple products associated with a customer

Parameters

  • customer_id (uint) – The ID of the customer

  • products (dict[]) – List of product and dosespot IDs

  • custom (dict) – Custom Host and DB info ‘host’ the name of the host to get/set data on ‘append’ optional postfix for dynamic DBs

Returns

list

classmethod range(start, end, memo_id=None, custom={})¶

Range

Returns the tracking records within the given range

Parameters

  • start (uint) – The start timestamp

  • end (uint) – The end timestamp

  • memo_id (uint) – Optional memo user to filter by
